heading: EMOTIV
short_description: The EMOTIV is a consumer-grade EEG headset used for research and brain-computer interfaces, capable of reading brain signals, providing derived metrics, and tracking head movement.
description: The EMOTIV is an electroencephalography (EEG) headset that reads brain signals and sends them into a computer. This is a consumer-grade device generally used for research outside of laboratories and brain-computer interfaces (BCIs). Emotiv not only acquires the raw signals, but it also provides meaningful metrics derived from the signal. It also has motion data to track head movement.

data.name: X
data.description: X-axis gyroscope data for the EMOTIV headset

data.name: Y
data.description: Y-axis gyroscope data for the EMOTIV headset

data.name: Z
data.description: Z-axis gyroscope data for the EMOTIV headset

heading: Muse
description: The Muse is another consumer EEG grade-headset. This one is generally intended for sleep studies, and meditation. It mainly acquires signals from the frontal lobe.

data.name: TP9
data.description: EEG activity from the left temporal lobe.

data.name: TP10
data.description: EEG activity from the right temporal lobe.

data.name: AF7
data.description: EEG activity from the left frontal lobe.

data.name: AF8
data.description: EEG activity from the right temporal lobe

heading: Face
short_description: This sensor allows you to capture video of your face and detect specific movements and getures
description: This sensor allows you to capture video of your face and detect specific movements and gestures

heading: VideoHeartRate
short_description: This sensor allows you to measure yout heart rate from a video input
description: This sensor allows you to measure yout heart rate from a video input

data.name: Heart rate
data.description: Heart rate estimated from changes in the color of your face

heading: AudioVolume
short_description: This sensor allows you to measure the volume (Root Mean Square) of audio from the microphone
description: This sensor allows you to measure the volume (Root Mean Square) of audio from the microphone

data.name: Volume
data.description: The Root Mean Square of the values of the signal

heading: FaceSync
short_description: This sensor allows you to measure the synchronicity of facial expressions
description: This sensor allows you to measure the synchronicity of facial expressions
